entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
